question: Which among the following would follow when RBI cuts the CRR?
option1: Stress on money markets would increase
option2: Stress on money markets would decrease
option3: Banks will need to invest more in Government Securities
option4: Banks will need to increase the interest rates
answer: Stress on money markets would decrease
explanation: cash reserve ratio — the portion of deposits that banks keep in cash with the central bank — to ease the strain in money markets.
